channel.title: Pimpscape :: How to add Object - Help Please!
channel.description:
Hey, I really need help with how to add objects like bank booths in pimpscape. I tried adding objects from the objects.CFG file but that doesn't work so if anyone could help me that would be great. :)
Thanks.

item.title: Pimpscape :: How to add Object - Help Please!
item.dc:creator: @duffy12345678910 duffy12345678910
item.description:
@duffy12345678910 wrote:

go into client.java search for makeglobalobject then copy the bank both code should look like this
makeGlobalObject(XPOS, YPOS, 2213, 0, 10); // bank then paste it in the bottom of all the makeglobalobjects then just write in the x cords in xpos and y cords in ypos

Read full topic
item.source: Pimpscape :: How to add Object - Help Please!

item.title: Pimpscape :: How to add Object - Help Please!
item.dc:creator: @mich702703 mich702703
item.description:
@mich702703 wrote:

Search for makeGlobalObject in Client.java u wil find all ur objects after a while.

this is the code to make one:

makeGlobalObject(XPOS, YPOS, 2213, 0, 10); // bank

Read full topic
item.source: Pimpscape :: How to add Object - Help Please!
